verses.verse: If <S%G1437><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> with the tongues <S%G1100><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> and of angels, <S%G32><s%> but do not have <S%G2192><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> I have become <S%G1096><s%> a noisy <S%G2278><s%> gong <S%G5475><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a clanging <S%G214><s%> cymbal. <S%G2950><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> [the gift of] prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and know <S%G3609><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> mysteries <S%G3466><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> and if <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> as to remove <S%G3179><s%> mountains, <S%G3735><s%> but do not have <S%G2192><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> I give <S%G5595><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> my possessions <S%G5225><s%> to feed <S%G5595><s%> [the poor,] and if <S%G1437><s%> I deliver <S%G3860><s%> my body <S%G4983><s%> to be burned, <S%G2545><s%> but do not have <S%G2192><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> it profits <S%G5623><s%> me nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Love <S%G26><s%> is patient, <S%G3114><s%> love <S%G26><s%> is kind, <S%G5541><s%> [and] is not jealous; <S%G2206><s%> love <S%G26><s%> does not brag <S%G4068><s%> [and] is not arrogant, <S%G5448><s%>

does not act <S%G807><s%> unbecomingly; <S%G807><s%> it does not seek <S%G2212><s%> its own, <S%G1438><s%> is not provoked, <S%G3947><s%> does not take <S%G3049><s%> into account <S%G3049><s%> a wrong <S%G2556><s%> [suffered,]
does not rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> but rejoices <S%G4796><s%> with the truth; <S%G225><s%>

bears <S%G4722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> hopes <S%G1679><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> endures <S%G5278><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things. <S%G3956><s%>

Love <S%G26><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> fails; <S%G4098><s%> but if <S%G1535><s%> [there are gifts of] prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> they will be done <S%G2673><s%> away; <S%G2673><s%> if <S%G1535><s%> [there are] tongues, <S%G1100><s%> they will cease; <S%G3973><s%> if <S%G1535><s%> [there is] knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> it will be done <S%G2673><s%> away. <S%G2673><s%>
For we know <S%G1097><s%> in part, <S%G3313><s%> and we prophesy <S%G4395><s%> in part; <S%G3313><s%>
but when <S%G3752><s%> the perfect <S%G5046><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> the partial <S%G3313><s%> will be done <S%G2673><s%> away. <S%G2673><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> I was a child, <S%G3516><s%> I used to speak <S%G2980><s%> as a child, <S%G3516><s%> think <S%G5426><s%> as a child, <S%G3516><s%> reason <S%G3049><s%> as a child; <S%G3516><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I became <S%G1096><s%> a man, <S%G435><s%> I did <S%G2673><s%> away <S%G2673><s%> with childish <S%G3516><s%> things.

For now <S%G737><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> in a mirror <S%G2072><s%> dimly, <S%G135><s%> but then <S%G5119><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> to face; <S%G4383><s%> now <S%G737><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> in part, <S%G3313><s%> but then <S%G5119><s%> I shall know <S%G1921><s%> fully <S%G1921><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as I also <S%G2532><s%> have been fully <S%G1921><s%> known. <S%G1921><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> three; <S%G5140><s%> but the greatest <S%G3173><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> is love. <S%G26><s%>
